data.author: Chris Lewis

changelog.release_notes:
v4.6:
- Dismiss full charge notification on unplug.
- Fix a minor layout bug.

v4.5:
- Built with SDK 4.0. In FW 4.0, the launcher entry will now show upcoming scheduled events. This is the only information that really makes sense to show here without an Android AppGlance API.
- Improve the app icon.

v4.3:
- Added option to choose a notification sound for the Find Phone function. Free choice of file may take more time, but this is good for now.
- Added option to post an Android notification when the phone has fully charged. Keep Dashboard enabled in the 'Notifications' section of the Pebble app to receive this.
- Enabled repeating button clicks for scrolling through the toggle grid by holding the button down.
- Fixed notification icon being white circle for Dashboard notifications.

v4.2:
- Unified old and new designs: the icons are back, and centre stage! Use the Up button to view phone status, and the Select button from there to manage Events.

v4.1: 
- Only use ActionMenu when there is more than one action.
- Fix bug with options card not appearing on some devices.
- Fix logic responsible for calculating free space.
- Fix a couple more state/drawing bugs.

v4.0:
- New watchapp design!
- Ability to jump straight to a toggle upon launch.
- Displays GSM network signal strength.
- Displays Wifi network name.
- Displays free storage on phone.
- Re-syncs every 30 seconds while the watchapp is open.
- Repeating clicks enabled in the schedule number window.
- Improved communication protocol.

v3.2:
- Align PBW versions with Android app.

v3.0
- ALL USERS MUST UPDATE ANDROID APP!
- New design for Pebble Time/Steel/Round
- Redesign for Pebble/Pebble Steel
- Fixes bug with Aplite battery display
v1.20: Fix for apparent issue with sync on 3.6.

v1.19:
- ENSURE YOU ALSO HAVE THE ANDROID APP UPDATE!
- Compatibility update for Pebble Time.

v1.17:
- Fix a bug scheduling an auto-brightness event.
- Fix a bug causing the Find Phone service to get stuck in a null STOP state.

v1.16:
- Added Auto Brightness toggle.
- Added toggle for managing the Device Admin status of the Android app. This must be disabled before the app can be uninstalled.
- Fixed bug causing prompt for root access on Android 4.4 and below.
- Fixed bug preventing prompt for Device Admin access on first install.
- Removed spammy live updating of layout. Restart watchapp to apply.
- Improved connection reliability on some devices.
- Improved debug logging.

v1.15:
- Fix a crash for users upgrading with modified toggle layout.
- Fix a bug from v1.14 when the Wakeup List would always show status as OFF.

v1.13
- As of Lollipop, Data toggle requires root.
- Improved Material layout design.
- Ringers fixed on Lollipop: Loud is now All and Silent is now Priority.
- Improved log output in case of error.
- Wakeups needed to be wiped, so be sure to add them again.

v1.10
- New Android app landing activity.
- Changed install flow to reduce confusion.

1.8:
- Added ability to schedule toggle events by long-pressing SELECT.
- Improved layout drawing.

v1.7:
- 'Find phone' is now a toggle.
- Added Recent News in About.
- Various UI improvements.

data.description:
This watchapp lets you control:
- Wi-Fi
- Network Data
- Bluetooth
- Phone Ringer
- AutoSync
- Wi-Fi Access Point
- 'Find phone' sound
- Lock Screen

and also shows you:
- GSM network name
- GSM network strength
- Wifi network name
- Phone battery level
- Phone free space

latest_release.release_notes:
v4.6:
- Dismiss full charge notification on unplug.
- Fix a minor layout bug.

data.title: Dashboard
